wikipedia_page.main: Lynn Breeze is a British illustrator and author.Lynn is known for writing and illustrating children's books, including "All Day Long" and "All Night Long" Hodder & Stoughton; the "This Little Baby" series Orchard ("My Day Out", "My New Baby", "My New Potty", "My First Tooth"); "Babyfaces" series Orchard ("Baby's Food", "Baby's Toys", "Baby's Clothes", "Baby's Animals"); "Pickle" books Kingfisher ("Pickle and the Box", "Pickle and the Blanket", "Pickle and the Blocks" and "Pickle and the Ball"), as well as illustrating books by other authors such as Tony Bradman's "Billy and the Baby" and "Our Baby", Lorraine Kelly's "Numbers", "Colours", and "Opposites", Donna Bryant's One Day series (including "One Day at the Seaside" and "One day at Grandma's"); Sue Nicholls's "Bobby Shaftoe Clap Your Hands", Felicia Law's "Lost Baggage"', Joy Cowley, Joyce Dunbar's "Potatoes and Tomatoes"and David Hately's "Noah".
